text: The Utah War, also known as the Mormon War or Mormon Rebellion, was an armed conflict between Mormon settlers in Utah Territory and the U.S. governmentâ€™s armed forces. It lasted from May 1857 to July 1858. == References == *[Allen, James B.; Leonard, Glen M. (1976), The Story of the Latter-day Saints, Salt Lake City, UT: Deseret Book Co., ISBN 0-87747-594-6] *[Arrington, Leonard (1985). Brigham Young: American Moses. New York: A. Knopf. ISBN 978-0-3945-1022-4.] Category:Wars
title: Utah War
